Dependency=ASHRAE IECC Climate Zone 2004: # Source: Constructed using U.S. EIA 2009 Residential Energy Consumption Survey (RECS) microdata.
# Assumption: There are no mini-split heat pumps in RECS 2009
# Assumption: Due to low sample sizes for some heating fuel types, heating fuel data is queried from three groups:1) Electricity, 2) None, and 3) Natural Gas, Propane, Fuel Oil, and Other Fuel Data.
# Assumption: Assume indicated non-heat pump electric heating is a heat pump when respondents say their AC is a heat pump.
# Downselected: This characteristic was downselected from project_national.
